channel.title: Startup on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Startup on My blog

item.title: First entry
item.author: davidh@bionicturtle.com (David Harper, CFA, FRM)
item.description: What is this? This is my new site for sharing my rstats learning. The site is generated by the blogdown package. Here is Yihui Xie’s helpful book-in-progress. Yihui is the developer of blogdown. This whole setup is super-cool. For example, LaTex support is built-in with this theme; apparently, a pair of a pair of dollar signs will render inline questions, as in $$ f(k) = {n \choose k} p^{k} (1-p)^{n-k} $$
